jakarta.json.stream.JsonLocation

Packages that use JsonLocation
Package
Description
jakarta.json.stream
Provides a streaming API to parse and generate JSON.

  • Uses of JsonLocation in jakarta.json.stream

    Methods in jakarta.json.stream that return JsonLocation
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    JsonLocation
    JsonParser.getLocation()
    Return the location that corresponds to the parser's current state in the JSON input source.
    JsonLocation
    JsonParsingException.getLocation()
    Return the location of the incorrect JSON.
